component.name: RunKat
component.summary: A cute running cat CPU indicator for COSMIC desktop

description.p: NOTE: This application requires the COSMIC desktop environment and will not function on other desktop environments.
RunKat is a native COSMIC panel applet that displays an animated cat that runs faster when CPU usage is higher. When CPU usage drops below a configurable threshold, the cat curls up and sleeps.

ul.li: Animated running cat driven by CPU usage, frequency, or temperature
Optional CPU percentage display beside the cat
Sleep mode with per-source configurable thresholds
Per-core CPU stats popup with scrollable display
Automatic dark/light theme adaptation
Native COSMIC panel integration with proper sizing

description.p: Code quality and documentation improvements — no functional changes.

ul.li: Removed dead code from v1.x (PopupPosition, legacy fields, unused channels)
Replaced all eprintln! with structured tracing logging
Extracted helpers to eliminate duplicated logic

Added comprehensive comments throughout all source files

description.p: Native COSMIC panel applet! Complete architecture rewrite.

Native popup dropdown with per-core CPU stats
